title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
I’m a physicist, engineering exec, investor. Here’s my story:

Born and raised in NCR, India. Delhi native, I live in SF.
Got hooked on science early, did my B.Tech in EE from IIT, PhD in Applied Physics from Caltech.
Learned business by working at startups for 10+ years and getting MBA at Wharton.
I founded a bootstrapped company to help data teams optimize their Snowflake spend.
I enjoy building stuff for internet and physical systems using data and AI games.

title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
I’m a physicist, engineering exec, investor. Here’s my story:

Born and raised in NCR, India. Delhi native, I live in SF.
Got hooked on science early, did my B.Tech in EE from IIT, PhD in Applied Physics from Caltech.
Learned business by working at startups for 10+ years and getting MBA at Wharton.
I founded a bootstrapped company to help data teams optimize their Snowflake spend.
I enjoy building stuff for internet and physical systems using data and AI games.

title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
Some things I’ve done

Built AI systems that crunch petabytes of data across image, text, and tabular formats.
Scaled these systems to serve millions of customers simultaneously 1, 2.
Created systems that use neural networks to analyze satellite imagery at planet scale.
Led teams of 120+ brilliant minds in data science, engineering, and analytics.

title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
Tech I love working with:

PyTorch, Hugging Face, Langchain, Pydantic
GCP, Snowflake, Bigquery
Anything that pushes the boundaries of what’s possible with data

title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
Investing:

My current areas of interest are: AI, infrastructure, open source, physical systems / frontier tech.
Some companies I have invested in - Comet, Startree, Inference, Nimble, Turnstile, Dandelion…
I am a founding member and part of the steering committee at Invest in Data where I co-invest with a group of ~50 other Data execs.
We vet and invest on a quarterly cadence. If you have an exciting AI project or a game-changing startup idea? Let’s talk: shwetank.kumar@gmail.com.

title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
Where you can find me:

Writing about AI musings, tech & leadership, and data science on this blog
Sharing insights on LinkedIn
Tinkering with code on GitHub
Speaking on panels about the future of AI and data
